channel.title: [C4D] One Ring to rule them all
channel.description:
Well I decided to make the one ring from Lord of the Rings and it took me awhile to get the text right and I know it is right because I have a One Ring in rl(not a real gold one but gold plated) and I compared them and they are identical. I learned a bit on materials doing this as well so I am overall happy with this.
Edit: [img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/r.jpg[/img]

item.title: [C4D] One Ring to rule them all
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

The text is perfect, unless my ring was damaged coming to me it is perfect, texture isn’t but text is.

Read full topic
item.source: [C4D] One Ring to rule them all

item.title: [C4D] One Ring to rule them all
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Archer:

No shit, but I modeled this off my ring because I got it perfect and could care less about the pretty fire text detail that I really could care less about, in fact most times in the movie the text wasn’t even visible.

Three things:
It’s NOT perfect.
You said that you COULD care less? And you said it twice. That actually means you care a little.
And you could only see it in the movie when he wore it and it was working, but you could see it nonetheless.

Read full topic
item.source: [C4D] One Ring to rule them all
